shortdesc.p: Extensible Markup Language (XML) is a markup language that defines a set of rules for encoding documents in a format that is both human-readable and machine-readable.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Extensible Markup Language (XML) is a markup language that defines a set of rules for encoding documents in a format that is both human-readable and machine-readable.

shortdesc.p: A markup language is a system for annotating a document in a way that is syntactically distinguishable from the text.

topicmeta.shortdesc: A markup language is a system for annotating a document in a way that is syntactically distinguishable from the text.

shortdesc.p: In reality, there are many different markup languages out there in the world. For web design and development, there are three specific markup languages that you will likely run across.

topicmeta.shortdesc: In reality, there are many different markup languages out there in the world. For web design and development, there are three specific markup languages that you will likely run across.

shortdesc.p: HTML is the standard markup language for Web pages

topicmeta.shortdesc: HTML is the standard markup language for Web pages

topic.title: Some of the elements in HTML

shortdesc.p: An HTML element is an individual component of an HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) document or web page

topicmeta.navtitle: Some of the elements in HTML
topicmeta.linktext: Some of the elements in HTML
topicmeta.shortdesc: An HTML element is an individual component of an HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) document or web page

shortdesc.p: An XML Schema is a language for expressing constraints about XML documents

topicmeta.shortdesc: An XML Schema is a language for expressing constraints about XML documents

shortdesc.p: A document type definition (DTD) is a set of markup declarations that define a document type for a SGML-family markup language

topicmeta.shortdesc: A document type definition (DTD) is a set of markup declarations that define a document type for a SGML-family markup language

shortdesc.p: Oxygen XML Editor is a cross platform tool setting the standard in XML editing.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Oxygen XML Editor is a cross platform tool setting the standard in XML editing.

topic.title: How to create a schema language in Oxygen

shortdesc.p: An XML Schema describes the structure of an XML document and is used for validation purposes.

topicmeta.navtitle: How to create a schema language in Oxygen
topicmeta.linktext: How to create a schema language in Oxygen
topicmeta.shortdesc: An XML Schema describes the structure of an XML document and is used for validation purposes.
